overview: Sudharma is a home baker. She is looking for a support to deliver her cakes to clients across the city. When a young girl, Alma, visits her, Sudharma believes that she has come in response to her request. However, the girl has a different story to tell. A short interaction between the two inside the house, which is also Sudharma’s bakery, changes both their lives and they realise how their stories merge to give a new meaning to their existences.
title: Yes
